SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIPLOCATION_GETRECIPIENTS_BYFIELDOFFICEID
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get list of report recipients for a sponsorship location (include hierarchy above)
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIPLOCATION_GETRECIPIENTS_BYFIELDOFFICEID ( @fieldOfficeID uniqueidentifier = null) returns nvarchar(max) with execute as caller as begin
declare @reportRecipient nvarchar(max) = ''
select @reportRecipient = case when parent3ext.REPORTRECIPIENTID is not null then (select NAME from dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_DISPLAYNAME(parent3ext.REPORTRECIPIENTID)) + ' (' + (select DESCRIPTION from dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONTYPECODE where ID = parent3location.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONTYPECODEID) + '), ' else '' end + case when parent2ext.REPORTRECIPIENTID is not null then (select NAME from dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_DISPLAYNAME(parent2ext.REPORTRECIPIENTID)) + ' (' + (select DESCRIPTION from dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONTYPECODE where ID = parent2location.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONTYPECODEID) + '), ' else '' end + case when parent1ext.REPORTRECIPIENTID is not null then (select NAME from dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_DISPLAYNAME(parent1ext.REPORTRECIPIENTID)) + ' (' + (select DESCRIPTION from dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONTYPECODE where ID = parent1location.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONTYPECODEID) + '), ' else '' end + case when projectext.REPORTRECIPIENTID is not null then (select NAME from dbo.UFN_CONSTITUENT_DISPLAYNAME(projectext.REPORTRECIPIENTID)) + ' (' + (select DESCRIPTION from dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONTYPECODE where ID = projectlocation.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONTYPECODEID) + '), ' else '' end
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION projectlocation left join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONEXTENSION projectext on projectlocation.ID = projectext.ID
left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION parent1location ON parent1location.HIERARCHYPATH = projectlocation.HIERARCHYPATH.GetAncestor(1) left join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONEXTENSION parent1ext on parent1location.ID = parent1ext.ID
left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION parent2location ON parent2location.HIERARCHYPATH = parent1location.HIERARCHYPATH.GetAncestor(1) left join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONEXTENSION parent2ext on parent2location.ID = parent2ext.ID
left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION parent3location ON parent3location.HIERARCHYPATH = parent2location.HIERARCHYPATH.GetAncestor(1) left join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONEXTENSION parent3ext on parent3location.ID = parent3ext.ID
where projectlocation.FIELDOFFICEID = @fieldOfficeID
set @reportRecipient = rtrim(@reportRecipient) if len(@reportRecipient) > 0 set @reportRecipient = left (@reportRecipient, len(@reportRecipient)-1)
return @reportRecipient end
